languages.text: "Мы знаем тебя, {name}. Мы видели тебя в бою. Мы верим тебе".
"We know you, {name}. We have seen you in battle. We believe you."
languages.original_text: "Мы знаем тебя, {name}. Мы видели тебя в бою. Мы верим тебе".

traits.locale_text: "We know you, {name}. We have seen you in battle. We believe you."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

traits.locale_text: "We know you, {name}. We have seen you in battle. We believe you."

languages.text: «Te conocemos, {name}. Te hemos visto luchar. Te creemos».
languages.original_text: "We know you, {name}. We have seen you in battle. We believe you."

traits.locale_text: «Te conocemos, {name}. Te hemos visto luchar. Te creemos».
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: “我们认识你，{name}。我们在战场上见过你，我们相信你。”
languages.original_text: "We know you, {name}. We have seen you in battle. We believe you."

traits.locale_text: “我们认识你，{name}。我们在战场上见过你，我们相信你。”
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: 「お前のことは知っている、{name}。戦場で見かけた。お前の言うことを信じよう」
languages.original_text: "We know you, {name}. We have seen you in battle. We believe you."

traits.locale_text: 「お前のことは知っている、{name}。戦場で見かけた。お前の言うことを信じよう」
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: « Nous vous connaissons, {name}. Nous vous avons {mf|vu|vue} combattre et votre témoignage nous suffit. »
languages.original_text: "We know you, {name}. We have seen you in battle. We believe you."

traits.locale_text: « Nous vous connaissons, {name}. Nous vous avons {mf|vu|vue} combattre et votre témoignage nous suffit. »
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: "Wir kennen Euch, {name}. Wir haben Euch im Kampf gesehen. Wir glauben Euch."
languages.original_text: "We know you, {name}. We have seen you in battle. We believe you."

traits.locale_text: "Wir kennen Euch, {name}. Wir haben Euch im Kampf gesehen. Wir glauben Euch."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: "Seni biliyoruz {name}. Seni savaşta gördük. Sana inanıyoruz."
languages.original_text: "We know you, {name}. We have seen you in battle. We believe you."

traits.locale_text: "Seni biliyoruz {name}. Seni savaşta gördük. Sana inanıyoruz."
